plot outline: Ondu Kshanadalli is a 2012 Indian Kannada film, directed by Dinesh Babu and Produced by Jai Jagadish. The film stars Tarun Chandra, Bhama, Sanjjanaa, Jai Jagadish and Bhaskar in lead roles. The music of the film was composed by Giridhar Diwan and Goutham Shrivastav.
title: Ondu Kshanadalli
plot: _Ondu Kshanadalli_ (qv) is a 2012 Indian Kannada film, directed by Dinesh Babu and Produced by Jai Jagadish. The film stars Tarun Chandra, Bhama, Sanjjanaa, Jai Jagadish and Bhaskar in lead roles. The music of the film was composed by Giridhar Diwan and Goutham Shrivastav.
